page.title: 12The Knepp Estate, Shipley.1.
page.content: The Knepp Estate extends to 3,500 acres. A considerable proportion, including Knepp Castle, built in 1809, and Knepp Mill Pond is within the block. The Home Farm of Knepp Castle has 850 acres, 800 of which are farmable. Knepp has been protected from strong commercial pressures by the prestigious owners, the Burrell family, enabling support for the increasingly popular Jacob's sheep and the rare, championship herd of Red Poll cattle. Generous staffing, 10 employees, allows for the proper care and showing of the herd, once considered productive for dairy and beef.
